name: Freeflow Combat project for Android (Mix and Jam project)
name_original: Freeflow Combat project for Android (Mix and Jam project)
description: Hello this is a modification of the project that Mix and Jam has made available for free on GitHub on the freeflow I discovered this project with his video on the freeflow and since the project is free and open to all I decided to convert the project for a mobile android version Thank you to Mix and Jam for making this project and more open to all and thank you Mix and Jam for putting this project on GitHub.
